channel.title: PI adding a frame to the game screen (when you first login)
channel.description: It's hard for me to explain ok, what i want is when you first login.. it sends up a frame like something that has dialogue like rules etc that kinda stuff, like in some servers.. there is ::players and then a frame comes up and shows the player names etc. stuff like that.

item.title: PI adding a frame to the game screen (when you first login)
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Do you want, rules interface on startup? http://www.rune-serber.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/337307-pi-rules-interface-startup.html

Read full topic

item.title: PI adding a frame to the game screen (when you first login)
item.dc:creator: @ezzi ezzi
item.description:
@ezzi wrote:

I know what you want hold on.
in playerassistant.java search for the starter package, and at the end of the starter add “getPA().showInterface(19901);”
post errors don’t know if thats right >.<

Read full topic
